name.japanese: トラファルガー・D・ワーテル・ロー

keyMoments.title: Law vs. Smoker Battle Begins
keyMoments.description: Law engages Vice Admiral Smoker in combat outside the Punk Hazard research facility.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Law's post-timeskip combat abilities and his role as a Shichibukai.

keyMoments.title: Law Uses Mes to Extract Smoker's Heart
keyMoments.description: Law uses his Mes technique to extract Smoker's heart, encasing it in a cube-like form.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals one of Law's most powerful and terrifying abilities, crucial to the Punk Hazard arc.
keyMoments.quote: From your current standing, you couldn't see a few things.

keyMoments.title: Law Defeats Smoker
keyMoments.description: Law stands victorious over the collapsed Smoker, holding his heart.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Law as a formidable New World power and shifts the power dynamics of Punk Hazard.
keyMoments.quote: I don't have to say anything to you, Smoker.

keyMoments.title: Reunion with Luffy
keyMoments.description: Law reunites with Luffy at the research facility after two years.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the future alliance between Law and Luffy.

abilities.description: Law can extract a person's heart from their body, encasing it in a cube. The victim remains alive but any damage to the heart affects them.
Law creates a spherical space where he can manipulate anything within it, including performing surgical operations.

reveals.information: Can extract hearts using Mes technique

keyMoments.title: Smoker Confronts Law
keyMoments.description: Smoker engages Trafalgar Law in battle, demanding to know why he's on Punk Hazard.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Smoker's post-timeskip combat abilities and his continued distrust of pirates.

keyMoments.title: Uses Sea Stone Jitte
keyMoments.description: Smoker wields his sea stone-tipped jitte against Law to counter his Devil Fruit powers.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Smoker's strategic combat approach against Devil Fruit users.

keyMoments.title: Defeated by Law
keyMoments.description: Smoker collapses after Law extracts his heart, suffering a decisive defeat.
keyMoments.significance: Marks a significant loss for Smoker and a turning point in his Punk Hazard journey.

keyMoments.title: Monet's Debut
keyMoments.description: Monet, a harpy woman, observes the battle between Law and Smoker and reports to Caesar Clown.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces Monet as Caesar's assistant and spy on Punk Hazard.

reveals.information: Works for Caesar Clown as his assistant and observer

keyMoments.title: Tashigi's Flashback
keyMoments.description: Tashigi recalls her previous encounters with Smoker and the Straw Hat Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Provides character development and context for her dedication to justice and Smoker.

keyMoments.title: Reunion with Law
keyMoments.description: Luffy arrives at the research facility and is surprised to see Law.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the alliance between Luffy and Law for future arcs.

keyMoments.title: Caesar's Fury Over Escaped Children
keyMoments.description: Caesar becomes furious upon learning the children escaped with the Straw Hats.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals Caesar's desperation to keep his experiments secret from the Marines.

reveals.information: Desperately wants to keep his child experiments hidden from the Marines
